name: .NRF File Extension
summary: Learn about .NRF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Document folder file created by NeatWorks, a digital document organizing application; contains an exported copy of a Neat document folder that can be shared between Neat users; replaced by the .NDX extension when Neat 5 was released.

content: To create a NRF file using NeatWorks (older version of Neat 5) select Export → Document Folder File (.ntf), choose the save location, name the file, and click Save.
To import a NRF file into Neat 5, select Import → Neat File..., click "Browse," navigate to your NRX file, and click Open.
NOTE: The NRF file is similar to .NRT and .NRX files, which are used by older versions of Neat.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
